CustomField.description: Visual representation of analysis completion status.
CustomField.formula: IF( ISNULL( Analysis_Completed_Date__c ) ,IF(Analysis_Status_Calc__c <1, "", IMAGE("/img/samples/color_green.gif", "green", 15, Analysis_Status_Calc__c * 30)) & IF(Analysis_Status_Calc__c <7,IMAGE("/img/samples/color_yellow.gif", "yellow", 15, 210 - (Analysis_Status_Calc__c * 30)),""),IMAGE("/img/samples/color_green.gif", "green", 15,210)&" Completed "&TEXT( Analysis_Completed_Date__c )&":")&" "&TEXT(Analysis_Status_Calc__c)&" of 7 Sections Completed"
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Visual representation of analysis completion status.
CustomField.label: Analysis Status
